text: Looks like there is some triple-double code in DoubleFloats

elements.text: Looks like there is some triple-double code in DoubleFloats

text: Yes, it is there for use in determining double-double results for some functions when intermediate higher precision is used.  I don't think that I use it currently (I did in some earlier version).  The code should be good -- although it is of little use if you want elementary functions at triple-double accuracy with good speed.
